summary.description:
a universal framework for multi-omics data integration and biological discoveries.

Towards this, we have expanded our in-house developed Soybean Knowledge Base (SoyKB), a comprehensive all-inclusive web resource for soybean to other organisms via Knowledge Base Commons (KBCommons) without the need for reinventing the wheel.

Advancement of next generation sequencing and high-throughput technologies has resulted in generation of multi-level of 'OMICS' data for many organisms
summary.name: KBCommons
